meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> causes the <radical>capital</radical> to become very <kanji>cool</kanji>. The capital was already a pretty cool temperature, but with the addition of the water from the tsunami, the capital is now very cool.
readingMnemonic: You find out that the <kanji>cool</kanji> tsunami water is coming from <reading>Sue Zoo</reading> (すず). The only animal there is a penguin named Sue, so the Sue Zoo is always kept cool for her. But now that Sue's fountain broke, the cool water is everywhere! Time to sue the zoo…
